description:
Ryuichi is in high school now. He takes the daycare gang around to see the school`s clubs, which are recruiting. He also tries to get people to join the babysitter club, but it doesn`t seem to be going very well...
Later, Ryuichi gets sick, and has to stay in bed. On the chairwoman`s instruction, Kotaro works hard to try to make Ryuichi a special drink that will make him better.
Source: crunchyroll
